title: Terrific purchase
review:
Firstly thanks to Lenovo for a beautiful phone under 10k
I'm writing this review after using this phone for a week

The good things on this phone are,

Good Display with 1080p resolution
Dolby Atmos works superb 
3GB of ram does pretty well and 1.3GB ram is free 
Metal body is good and very similar to Redmi3s
Camera is excellent with pro mode
Dual app feature works fine
No lag while playing games
It has good Battery life last for one and half day even with more usage
Fingerprint sensor is faster

Bad things are,

Placement of speakers
Slow charging

I didn't find anything else worse than the above




Overall it's been a great phone under 10k better than Redmi 3s
Anyone wants to buy a phone under 12k this is the best one

title: Great product
review:
Best product comparing with Le ECO 1s, Le2, Redmi 3S, Note 3, 3S Prime and other 10k approx. Devices.

Reviewing after 4 days of usage......
If u r looking for budget oriented smart phone go for K6 power.

Pros:
4000mAh battery
Qualcomm Snapdragon 430 (bit smaller compared to note 3) but works fine
Android Marshmallow 6.0.1
13 MP rear facing with Sony sensor camera
8MP front facing camera
Dolby Atmos enabled
VR and compass sensors
Fingerprint Sensor

Cons
Quick charging not available
Dual SIM slot ( either 2 SIMS or 1 SIM and sd  card)

Tested battery by charging once after receiving the product from Flipkart (on time delivery). 
Battery is too good you can use 25+ hours by charging 3 hours. It gets 5 out of 5

Marshmallow is good and Lenovo is bit slow in launching Android updates. Mostly it takes 3 to 6 months for Noughat.

Tested camera - whatever the features provided are enough.... There are some features which are necessary are not provided.
But camera performance gets 4 out of 5

Sound quality with Atmos is flawless and even tested with earphones. Great quality.

Display 1080p HD screen with 5 inch screen.

VR works fine and compass also works fine.

Fingerprint Sensor is little bit more responsive compared to Lenovo K5 Note.

The thing I was unhappy with the phone is quick charging. I tested with quick chargers but did not work.

As most of the devices have same format of  either inserting both SIM Cards or Inserting a SIM Card and SD Card.

It supports VOLTe . Tested with Jio works good.

Thanks to Flipkart for faster delivery and on time delivery. Nice packing.

title: Super!
review:
Lenovo K6 Power ******

First I want to say it is the best mobile under 10000k also rather than Redmi 3s Prime...

*Display- FHD that is very good thing also its display clarity and also you can see 3d  video by long pressing power botton and choose VR

*Sound- I can't say about its Dolby Digital Audio because all you know about Dolby sound quality

*RAM & ROM- 3GB & 32 GB a very good thing  it left almost 24 GB internel memory for your personal use

*Android Version & Interface- Android 6.0.1 Marshmallow and Lenovo Pure Vive UI is the best combination among all the budget mobile under 10000k which make this mobile very very fast and very very powerfull

*Camera- Rear 13MP &  front 8MP which is very good but I think rear flash is bit low. After all these camera capture a very good picture

*Fingerprint- Fingerprint unlock is the very important part in this mobile which take your print of your finger very very fast less than a second

*Hybride Sim Slot- You can able to use a sim and a micro sd card or use two sim card  at a time and both sim are nano sim card type

*Network- Oviously 4G VoLTE faciality and double sim 4G VoLTE also


*******At last I want to say again that the **Lenovo K6 Power** is the best mobile rather than Redmi 3s Prime. Do you thik  to buy Redmi 3s Prime then I suggest that don't buy Redmi you can buy K6 Power that is a very best choise of yourself.....

title: Mic problem
review: voice cant be heard by other side clearly

title: A straight and honest review and detailed comp with 3s prime
review:
without waiting time i'll tell u what t's worth then decision is up to u...
assuming u already read the description and features lets go to performance 
3 gb ram out of 1.2 is free for flawless usage... didn't had any hanging or rebooting issue with this one, i'm a heavy user,as my data is on 24/7 and my all social and the apps are always running in background  i  still get a whole day of non stop processing i.e, battery backup is good but not as grate as xiomi redmi 3s prime it's bcz of the screen resolution k6 power wields 1080ppi screen where as 3s prime has  720ppi. and over that 3s prime has 100MAh extra battery.. so i have used both alternately i have both of em so i'm honest here... 3s prime is about half a day more lasting than k6  power.
both the phones have same hardware and on board features so there is no difference in performance... let me rank them,
1. Gaming, both have same Adreno 505.. i played nova , modern combat,asphalt 8 and asphalt nitro, and i was freaking impressed there was not a single frame drop, not even a slightest hanging flawless and superb experience in both of them but i noticed some warm up in 3s prime while playing but not in k6 power . so for gaming i'll give 9/10 

2. Battery , k6 power has 4000MAh of lithium polymer battery where as 3s prime has 4100 MAh it isn't much of a difference but  still xiomi has a lead 

3. Sound,, k6 power has 2 Dolby atoms rear facing speakers and 3s prime has mi louders simple.. 3s prime dosen't stand's a chance of comparison 
i use Dolby atoms in k6 power with sony head phone they realy change the experience of listing music.. without headphones the sound ok k6 power is impressive and loud with rich base and surround sound i'll give 10/10 for sound in k6 power.

4. Display .. k6 power is holding a full 1080 hd  ips display where as 3s has 720pp HD.. watching movie or hd vedios on k6 power gives rich experience i'll give 8.5/10 for the display because of it's high resolution display it consumes more power..

5.storage..both have 32 gb interna out of witch in k6 power's android consumes 8.01 gb and available for user is 24gb wher as in 3s prime gives 25 gb free for user  so i'll give 8/10 for storage

6.design.. both of them has uni body full metal body .. but especially for me i think k6 power has a better build quality science i have seen some tear and wear on 3s prime some paint loss and some fading but k6 is holding good, i have accidentally dropped it  once or twice too but had no issue.
k6 power is a tad thicker and bulkier than 3s prime but weights same in hand and usage but i like the hold of k6 power, but it has some round edges which makes the phone slippery as a soap so u have to be careful with that bcz none have the glass protection so investing on screen protecter will be a good precaution..i'll give 9/10 for looks and build quality  

7. ''CHARGING'' now guy's do read this one carefully bcz there is a twist that will make u re think again before purchasing..
while charging both the phone take around 2.30 to 3 hours to full charge from 0-100 as both of the comes with 5.2v 2 amps charger but-but-but 
while charging lenovo k6 power heats up like a hot plate u can defiantly cook an omelet for free of cost LOL the highest temp while charging was recorded 48.7 d's this is a major problem with this phone,. and u should know heating is the biggest enemy of battery bcz of heating battery looses it's backup power and eventually it will reduce it's performance too so consider this as a good advice and use a 1.2 amp charger it'll take some time to charge but will ensure your product's long and healthy life i tested and use a moto 1.2 amp charger it work's grate and doest not heat's the devie while charging and backup is also good .. but it does not heats up while heavy usage it becomes warm just a little like arround 38 d's that's common... but with xiomi it dosen't heat's much while charging but sure does when heavy used. 
 
NO doubt k6 power is the best supper phone for 8999, but it has it's own problem like over heating while charging despite of that u get 1080ppi of full hd screen and doubly atoms, build quality and looks of k6 power is better than 3s prime  

so now u know every thing about k6 and it's rival 3s prime .... now decision is yours to make... so  now which one will u chose.

i'll personally suggest u to go for k6 power bcs it has more features and better build quality than it's rivals  it's worth every single rupee.
 hit like if u find it use full and vise-versa... thank you for reading

title: Worth every penny
review:
# DETAILED REVIEW AFTER 1 WEEK #
Pros:-
1.Good general performance and processing speed.No lags so far.
2.Multitasking is fluid and has no Ram management issues like Redmi note 3.
3.Full HD display.
4.Gaming is smooth in light and medium graphics.
5.Speaker sound is excellent and very loud.Best in budget segment for sure.
6.Super front cam (8MP)
7.Build quality feels solid with metal body.
8.No issues with network reception and VOLTE is working well with Reliance Jio.
9.Good battery life.Lasts one full day with heavy usage.
 
Cons: 
1.No in-built screen protection.
2.Back camera is average.Low light image quality is bad.
3.Hybrid sim tray.

My Verdict:
The best phone you can buy below Rs.10000 for sure at present.Personally i prefer this over other options.Hope this review was helpful!

Its a great phone.Go for it 
PROS :-
1. Its build and design. Metallic body looks stunning. And very well built the whole phone.
2.  Battery Life. Its just superb.  Take 3 hrs to get full charge and it lasts for 2 days with average usage and more than 1 day with extreme usage.

4. Stock Android UI. No lags and RAM is enough available for multitasking. 1.5Gb RAM available for you all the time after installing the apps.
5. VoLTE. Jio sim works fine with great speed.

CONS:-
1.Front camera.  Photo quality is good but the camera is not wide angled. Not too many person can come in one selfie.Redmi 3s has wide angle front camera.

title: Simply awesome, but its a Hybrid Slot Phone...
review:
Excellent phone...
First look device is compact and classy.

Update- I have been using it for 4 days and general performance is very good.

UI is good,Now its looks like a stock android. Lenovo removed unnecessary apps and general perfomance is good and you can also uninstall remaining useless apps also, which is a good thing.

Fingerprint sensor is super fast, performance is smooth.

Storage - Out of 32 GB, 24 GB is free at the time of first boot. Ram is free around 1.6 GB for first time out of 3 GB.

Hybrid Slot- You can use 2 Sim only or 1 Sim+ 1 micro sd, not 2 Sim+ micro sd at a time. So if you want all three slots working at the same time, Don't purchase it. 

Camera is good or above average, on par with Redmi 3s prime, low light photography is average at its best. If you want mainly a camera phone, you may be disappointed.
Buy Honor 8 or something like that but you have to spend a lot of money for a good camera phone.

Battery life is very good with full HD display.

Display- Display is good colors are sharp and near accurate but Brightness is somewhat average but that is not problem for me because I prefer Battery life.   

Jio 4G- I have been using it along with aitel, and network reception is good.
           Speed of net largely depends upon the area you live and network coverage,     and Now a days Jio network speed is drastically decreased as the number of people is increased, but call quality is good for me.
    
Gaming perfomance is good but ram fills up quickly, lenovo must notice this problem and give a update to its users.
So Gaming on redmi 3s prime > lenovo k6 power because of its HD display as compared to Full HD display of this, I am talking about higher frame rates (smoothness).


and at last I gave a overall rating- 4.5/5.

If you don't want to buy Xiaomi Redmi 3s prime, then surely buy this. 
Flipkart services is good, but I don't get the offer on Moto Pulse 2 headphones so flipkart don't do false ads.
And please hit the like button.
I hope this review may be helpful for many buyers who want to buy this on next sale.
Thanks for reading.

title: The product could have been much better!
review:
This is the first time I am writing a critical review. I usually only like to appreciate things.
However, 2 unexpected inconvenient situations faced.

1. This phone was ordered from the flash sale. Even though I managed to get one and get it delivered on time, I found that there were some hardware issues. Even the product description wasn't explicit about 2nd SIM slot being only usable for SIM or Memory Card. "Hybrid" slot that was mentioned in the description could also mean that the slot is designed in such a way that both Nano SIM as well as Memory card can be used together. Anyhow, giving them the benefit of doubt, I went ahead only to find out that the fingerprint scanner has some hardware issue. Sometimes it detected the fingerprint other times it doesn't. Even the Jeeves technician checked it.

2. When I asked Flipkart for refund as I thought K4 note is much better than K6 Power and my wife has been using it for last 1+ years, Flipkart said we can only replace and not refund. I had a similar experience with Amazon but I must explicitly mention that Amazon did not argue or debate about it. I asked for refund and they processed it. It just shows that Amazon is actually so customer friendly than Flipkart. I'm not sure if I will purchase anything further from Flipkart anymore.

title: heating problem
review: gets hanged many times and devices gets heated during charging

title: Reviewed Everything Except Gaming
review:
(Feel sorry for the people who got defective products. It is possible for one or two pieces from a large scale manufacturing batch to be defective. Fortunately, I didn't receive any defective piece. So, the review is only about the phone without any hard feelings. I don't have time to play games. So, no comments on games. Do not waste time expecting to read about gaming).

User Interface/Experience: Mostly stock experience of Android. No non-sense UI. It's neat, uncluttered, organised and easy to use. EXCELLENT - 10/10.
Display: Stunning resolution. Excellent for reading text. The rendering of font is brilliant. Screen is sharper. EXCELLENT - 10/10
Videos: Very good resolution. I just felt while the colours are rendering there is a bit saturation. 9.5/10. VERY GOOD - 9.5/10
Audio: I use Sennheiser CX 300 II in ear phones which is one of the world's best ear phones. The stock ear phones are useless and I never use stock ear phones in my life. So, my experience may be definitely better. I also suggest to buy a good ear phone always.  Dolby quality is for real and certainly a differentiating factor. It enhances the "feel" of the audio especially at max volume. Bass is excellent on the phone. Singers voice when I hear melodies sound slightly sharper. But the same sounds normal without Dolby. Overall, I still rate Dolby effect on the phone is for "real" and very impressive. OUTSTANDING - 10/10. 
Touch Experience, Hardware, Speed etc: Very effective, quick, very negligible lag noticed when too many apps opened, no hangs noticed. EXCELLENT 9.75/10.
Camera: It's difficult to understand without posting actual images. So, I just rate directly. EXCELLENT 9.5/10. 
Gaming: No comments.
Weight,Size: Handy, sufficiently gripping. EXCELLENT 10/10
Finger Print scanner: Very fast and efficient. EXCELLENT 10/10
Build Quality: Sturdy. EXCELLENT 9.75/10

Finale: I especially fell in love with 'outstanding' Audio quality and if you listen to songs often, think no further. I rate this phone slightly better than Redmi 3s Prime for it's audio and video quality. 

Overall Recommendation: BUY.

Don't forget to like/dislike the review. It may help others.

title: Brilliant
review:
First of all, it is a great product within 10k. I am really loving it. I am writing this review after a week use, here are my opinion on its different components :-

Display - Probably the best thing about the product. It is simply amazing. Even redmi cannot compete with it in terms of display. Its resolution 1920×1080 really outclasses any other products in this price range. 5/5 for display.

Battery - 4.5/5 , While it might not be the best but it is pretty good. I myself play heavy games all day and i am a heavy user, for me it lasts a whole day, maybe 1 1/2 day. Even if you play heavy games for 8 hours a day, you will still find yourself charging the phone maximum once per day. So battery is pretty good.

Charging - I would rate it 4/5. I have noticed that it takes an average 3 hours to charge from 5% to 100%. One thing i liked very much is it doesnt heat up much during charging unlike mi phones which becomes almost a gas stove while charging.

Processor speed - 5/5 , great job on it. No lags expirienced. I have even played games like fifa 14, fifa 16, gta san andreas on full graphic settings and there was not a single lag. Love the gaming expirience.

Ram - Again as above the games were played smoothly. Also you will find about 1.5 GB ram free even after loading your phone with lots of apps which pretty good. 5/5 for it.

Storage - Again another great thing of this model. A storage of 32 GB from which you get 24 GB free is pretty big enough in my opinion at least keeping the price in mind. 4.5/5 for it.

Camera - I found it way better than redmi 4 or redmi 3s prime camera. Its rear camera is way better. Even a 5 year old can tell the difference just by seeing it. Coming to the front camera, 8MP is just too good for some cool selfies. I am impressed with the quality. 5/5 for it.

Speakers - Mind blowing 5/5. Dolby atoms speakers totally rock. You might not get the difference just like that but compare it with another phone like redmi 4 or redmi 3s prime and you will see the difference. Totally love it.

Thats it for now. If you are looking for a good display and camera, just go for it, totally worth it for this price.

If you agree with me, please leave a like.
Don't agree? Feel free to dislike. 
Thanks and have a good day!

title: Good choice
review:
Great battery life. Great display. Multitasking is smooth. Decent camera. Fingerprint reader is quick and accurate 9 out of 10 times. Call quality is pretty good. Pretty great device for media consumption given the full hd display which is crisp and punchy along with Dolby Atmos enabled stereo speakers.
Gaming also pretty impressive high quality graphic games are playable and very responsive. Doesn't heat up much.
Overall a great package for ₹8,999 .

Have been Using the phone for a week now.... All above mentioned pros still there. The phone hung up a couple of times. Also noticed a few hiccups here and there.

title: Deserves 5 star, Premium phone at this price !!
review:

title: Detailed Honest Review After 6 Day USe
review:
I have been using this mobile for last six days , its definitely a best budget Phone Under 10K We Can't Get More than this in this range 

Display 
Full HD Display : Display is one the best feature of this phone , Cristal clear display when used indoor , but it is not good that much good outdoor but still a very descent display . 

Ram :
Their is no lag , fast responsive We can use several apps at a time , even after opening many apps there is still 1GB free RAM available . Its the best 

Memory :
32 GB Inbuilt but System OS Occupies 8 GB Only 24 GB is available for User , the pnly bad thing about this is It;s a Hybrid Slot so Either we can use Two at a time or one sime one memory card .

Camera :
Camera Quality is the best you can take UHD pics the 13Mp Back Camera outdoor images are far far better than indoor , front with 8Mp is definitely best You Can get 

Battery :
Biggest advantage of this phone is 4000Mah Battery which last more than 1 day for moderate user , even for a heavy user it will give better result
there is some time slight heating issue which is because of  metal back cover . overall best battery 

Sound :
Audio quality of the mobile is at it's best , loudspeaker produces best audio , if you have good earphones you will definitely enjoy the sound , a theater like sound 

That's it all from me 

If your budget is around 10000 then go and  grab it , because it's steal deal there is also Redmi 3S prime available for 9000 but if you look at service of  both lenovo and Xiomi lenovo has the upper hand 


Pros :
Battery
3GB ram
Full HD Display
Atoms Dolby


Cons :
Hybrid slot 
NO Glass Protection (no gorilla,)
phone is slightly heavy there are chances screen breakage that if you mobile fell down to the ground 
Earphones : basic quality earphones not good for listening for music

title: Waste of money!
review:
* VERY VERY DISAPPOINTED *


On 8th Dec, I got 2 Kenobi k6 power mobiles...
which was my year ending blunder...
Very very disappointed...
on the both mobiles..
Still I'm under trials...
Later I g for return..

DEMERITS of the device...listed a few here.

1. No voice cal clarity....very poor n low volume
2. On Video call, it displays 40% video n 60% dial pad
3. Speedy battery draining
4. On and off lagging
5. Automatically switching off and sticking
6.At times vanishes contact list
7. No gallery n music inbuilt apps
8. No quality in voice recordings
9.No option for two Sims with one memory card
10. No video clarity while video calling....etc a few..

Plz don't go for this at any cost...

title: Worth for Money and Excellent Gift to Parents
review:
Actually I am lucky enough to get the product in flash sale, After so many analysis ordered this product.
I bought this smartphone for my mom as New year gift, And its her first smartphone.
Pros:
*Camera selfie is coming too good- picture perfect , no need of special apps to hide the dots in your face.
* Back camera is also good
* Battery extends for 1.5 days if you are moderately using WIFI orelse one complete day with WIFI also
*Charging happens very fast
* Rest all features are as good as 15-20k mobile
Cons:
* Gallery app is not present
Experience from my Mom side
* Actually since its the first smartphone she is using as her own, she is very much excited when she is learning how to send whatsapp messages, Audio messages, taking selfie.
* Every mor she is sending some Good message with Good morning.
* She is Tamilian, She knows English but not fluent, she is vigourously learning english to send messages without grammar(though i can install tamil version but still she loves this).
* Its like when we were kids, how we would feel very happy during completion of Alphabets, the same excitement i could see in her face on each and every new thing she is learning in smartphone.
*  Even the old generation also feels excited and happy- when they are up to the trend of youth.
* She started using paytm wallet pay in shopping. she is 51 came from a lower middle class.

* Kindly give the same experience to all your parents so that they will not feel odd in the current world. Like it and give this experience to your Parents, Grand Parents

title: Awesome
review:
I Love This Phone Got it for 8999rs
Using It Since 3 Months
Here Is The Pros And Cons

Pros
1. I Got Nougat Update (lol Everyone Get)
2. Battery backup is decent

    And 2 days for normal usage
3. Dolby is amazing Sound is great loud and clear
4. Front and rear camera both is awesome
5. Fingerprint works so fast 
6.Support Vr
7. Phone never hangs 
    Even after so many apps
8. Amazing looks and 32gb Rom and 4gb ram
9. I DON'T GET any mic problem
10. display is clear and awesome full hd
Cons
1. the earphone Provided Are worst
      (But I use my Headphone)
2. Hybrid SIM slot (1 SIM+ micro SD) or 2Sim
(Not a problem for me)
And No Other Con

Go for this if your budget is under 10000 this can beat redmi 4 and redmi note 4 phone easily.

title: Terrific purchase
review:
I'm using ths phn since jan 30 2017 
Cons -
huge heating while playing games .
Heating while charging phn .
Camera clarity in low light below average, especially front facing camera.
Little hanging while playing games ,and using 3rd party apps .
Led flash is not good,but ok 
Lenovo theme center is really really disappointing me :-(

Pros -
Good display Full HD 
Viewing angle is good 
Sound clarity is awsome no words to say tht.  
Camera in good light conditions is superb .
Processor speed is good 
Fingerprint sensor is good nd accurate.
Battery backup is really good .
Storge is good available around 25 GB. 
RAM management is good .

Overall this phone is good considering the price of 10 k 
But this phone is not good for playing games (also small games like Subway surfers,bubble shooter etc.)
Cam is not best ,if u want a btr camera phn in this price asus zenfone max is rly gud option .
  If u want a good battery backup phone, good display,good sound ,and good  performance go for it

title: Terrific
review: Nice

title: Contains all necessary elements of a decent smartphone
review:
I received my phone 3 days earlier than expected  which i think is great service from part of flipkart service providers.
The phone looks great and contains everything necessary for a budget smartphone with such a decent price tag.
It is working smoothly and the fingerprint sensor is pretty impressive.
It didn't get heated up even after excessive usage of various apps and games on the smartphone which i feel makes this phone more attractive.
The primary camera is decent and secondary camera is not up to mark but overall it is also quite fine.
The highlight of this phone is the "Dolby Atmos" speakers which are a top notch and display is also pretty good.
Storage capacity is sufficient for daily stuff and 3GB RAM makes it worth considering.
Overall it contains all necessary stuff which one looks for for an under Rs10K phone.
Go for it without any doubt.
(The following comment was made after using the phone for a day)

title: Brilliant
review:
I have been using this phone since 9 December and i can give you the full detailed review now.
Pros:
1. Extraordinary battery life.
2. Gaming experience is exceptionally high and any game is handled at it's high settings very easily without any lag.
3. The general performance is great, thanks to the 3GB ram.
4. The rear camera is too good for this price range. It even gives you the manual mode which is great. It has a noise cancellation mic with it on the back.
5. The front is also as good and clicks great selfies.
6. The phones never heats up even after 4 hours of continuous gaming and watching videos on 4G network and then switching to WiFi for the next online multiplayer gaming of 3 hours.
7. The screen is very beautiful and is truly full HD.
8. The sound is extremely loud thanks to the dual speakers and Dolby Atmos.
9. The screen despite not having any official word of Gorilla glass is tough as i had recently installed a tempered glass and before that the phone had fallen many times out of my hand.
10. The fingerprint sensor is also fast and gives haptic feedback on touching it. It can also be used to let the sceen from going into sleep mode by touching and finger gently onto it when phone is unlocked.
11. The flashlight i quite bright when used as a torch.
12. The phone works well with 4G network and has VOLTE by default and gives a great battery even with 4G always on.
13. There is a LED notification light on the front which is single colour i.e. white.
14. The audio of earpiece is clear and the person on the receiving end also gets a clear voice.
15. The GPS Bluetooth and built-in compass are quite fast and battery friendly.
16. The network strength is also very good on the handset.
Cons:
1. The phone does not have backlit capacitive buttons. But you get used to it after 4-5 days of usage.
2. When using speaker while calling the microphone does not work as well as expected. The sound is also low on loudspeaker while calling.(compared to my last phone moto g2)
3. This is not bight enough to be visible on a fully bight sunny day outdoors amd you have to find some angles for the screen to be visible.
4. The phones is too slippery as it has full metal body. Kindly order a good quality cover with the phone as well.
5. The phone is little heavy than your usual 5 inch screen phones due to the 4000 MAH battery but it is acceptable.

If you have any questions feel free to ask.

title: Simply awesome
review:
I am a big fan of Lenovo and flipkart .
This is the best smartphone in this price (Rs9999). You could never find any other phone in this price .
The points that this phone made me crazy are 

1> unbelievable battery backup last up to 3day in my hand (4000mah + ultimate power server)

2> Super sound quality with Dolby atom (360°)

3> Mind blowing design( full metal body) , uniform distribution of the parts like camera , fingerprint lock etc

4> Display is crystal clear with 441 ppi + 178° viewing angle) 

5> very fast performance with snapdragon 430 , 14 Ghz, 3gb ram + 32 gb rom (expendable upto 128gb) , support OTG with reverse charge 

6>Camera is also cool with sony lens (13Mp with the pro mode) front is also good(8mp)

7> Fast fingerprint sensor + Dual app
.. Ohh I have written  long like an essay . sorry! 
If I have enough money then i will surely buy the k6 note also!!!! Oh god help me! 
After showing to my cousin he also wants this ! So i will buy it again on 18 Dec ! Yahhooooooo
